channel.title: Machine Learning on Sohanuzzaman
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Sohanuzzaman

item.title: Ensemble Learning for PE Malware Detection
item.description: Currently refining the stacking architecture, feature selection, and reporting needed for thesis defense and manuscript submission.

item.title: UTKFace-Multitask-ViT
item.description: Built a custom ViT encoder with task-specific heads for age, race, and gender classification. Implemented multi-task loss balancing, mixed-precision training, and experiment tracking notebooks to benchmark attention-sharing strategies.
